hadiths.text: ‘Utbah bin ‘Abd Sulami said:“I heard the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) say: ‘There is no Muslim, three of whose children die before reaching the age of puberty, but they will meet him at the eight gates of Paradise and whichever one he wants he will enter through it.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي ثَوَابِ مَنْ أُصِيبَ بِوَلَدِهِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning the reward of one who (loses) his child
